description:
Created for Kokatat's 50th anniversary, the OM is arguably one of the most technologically advanced drytops around. Tough yet supple, refined yet utilitarian, it's a true blend of all things good. Highly abrasion-resistant material uses laminated construction to ensure dry sessions on the water. The cut gives you full mobility for quick, dynamic moves.

  • Body is 200-denier GORE-TEX® Pro nylon
  • Waterproof latex wrist gaskets are protected by punch-through neoprene outer cuffs to keep water out of your sleeves while paddling
  • Dual-adjustable neoprene skirt incorporates hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene for unhindered stretch
  • Self-draining arm pocket
  • Pullover design reduces bulk for great packability
name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Om Dry Top - Men's
